findings.message: QTX (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#5-211) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:QTX.transfer(address,uint256) (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#108-110)
findings.name: erc20-interface

findings.message:
QTX.transferOwnership(address) (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#59-62) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#60)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
QTX.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#59) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#60)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.19 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.19 (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
QTX.QTX() (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#32-38) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 420000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (0x745fa4002332c020f6a05b3fe04bccf060e36dd3.sol#33)
findings.name: too-many-digits

findings.name: external-function
